entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 15 except minus 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 9 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 27 January 2023
